title: Is the "Thank You" rewards a staggered release?
body: Just curious, as I have logged in and received the Summoner Icon but having already owned Kayle and Riot Kayle skin, I did not see anything else in the rewards. Just wondering if this was a bug or you guys didn't release the other part of the reward thing a free skin? Thanks!

replies.body: Staggered release is a great way to put it.  Because there are so many accounts involved, it's going to be a bit until every account receives every item it's eligible for.  Updates on this will be posted on our [support ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Let me know if you have any questions!
